description: The daily mood and habit tracker to make the best out of yourself!
activity-description: Configure the activities you want to track on a daily basis. Activities build the essence in your daily journal, so that you can easily spot how activily you are pursuing your passion, sport or habit. Over time you built habits! And as all the tracking is integrated you can measure your personal goals straight away!
no entries month: No entries in this month yet

confirm-delete.title: Delete entry?
confirm-delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this entry? This action cannot be undone.

confirm-delete-category.title: Delete category?
confirm-delete-category.description: Are you sure you want to delete this category and all associated activities? This removes the activities from all the respective entries as well.

confirm-delete-activity.title: Delete activity?
confirm-delete-activity.description: Are you sure you want to delete this activity? This removes the activities from all the respective entries as well.

confirm-discard.title: Discard changes?
confirm-discard.description: You have some unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard those and continue?

confirm-discard-due-datechange.title: Discard changes?
confirm-discard-due-datechange.description: You are about to switch to another date and still have some unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard those and continue?

user.name: Name
user.email already used: Email address already has an associated account

user.pw advice: Password needs to be at least 6 characters long
user.agree to terms: By creating an account, you agree to the Terms of Service.
